argument.name: file_open_mode
argument.description: The Open Mode system variables are:

page.discussion: The OPEN() method opens a data file for input or output and returns the object pointer to the file. The Open_Mode parameter determines how the file is to be accessed. You must supply an existing Filename with the appropriate Open_Mode system variable. Note : When you delete , Alpha Anywhere closes the file.

section.title: Example
section.description: Open any file and preview the first 20 characters.
section.example: dim file_pointer as P dim filename as C dim text as C filename = ui_get_file("Choose File", "Text File (*.txt)", "", "X") if filename = "" then end end if file_pointer = file.open(filename, FILE_RW_SHARED) text = file_pointer.read(20) trace.writeln("First 20 chars: " + text) file_pointer.close()
